title: Britain is top target in the world for cyber criminals
text:
Welcome to your preview of The Times Subscribe now Britain is top target in the world for cyber criminals The raids are often automated and carried out on a mass scale by internet applications set up to target particular programs and platforms Corbis Google+ 1 of 1 The raids are often automated and carried out on a mass scale by internet applications set up to target particular programs and platforms Corbis John Simpson Crime Correspondent Published 1 minute ago 
Britain is the leading target for cyber criminals following a recent increase in attacks from India and the Dominican Republic. 
Analysis of 75 million raids on international businesses over three months showed that Britain was the criminals’ favourite country, followed by America. One analyst attributed this to the vast sums of money moving through the City of London and the increasingly digitised approach to banking and money lending. 
Online lenders and financial services are losing up to £2 billion a year to hackers stealing passwords and making false accounts, the report by ThreatMetrix, the cyber security firm, said. The scale Subscribe now
